docTitle.titlePart:
New Furanoid Diterpenes from Teucrium
scordium L.

byline.docAuthor: Georgi Y. Papanov* and Peter Y. Malakov

front.keyword:
Teucrium scordium L., Lamiaceae, Clerodane Type, Furanoid Diterpene,
6 -Ketoteuscordin
front.div:
Two new furanoid diterpenes of clerodane type, 6-ketoteuscordin (1) and 6a-hydroxy-
teuscordin (2) have been isolated from Teucrium scordium var. scordium, Lamiaceae.
Their structures and stereochemistry have been determined.
